solution_line_template: There is {gilled_ratio_numerator} gilled mushroom for every {gilled_ratio_numerator} + {spotted_ratio} = <<{gilled_ratio_numerator}+{spotted_ratio}={total_ratio_parts}>>{total_ratio_parts} mushrooms.
Thus, there were {total_mushrooms} / {total_ratio_parts} = <<{total_mushrooms}/{total_ratio_parts}={gilled_mushrooms}>>{gilled_mushrooms} gilled mushrooms on the fallen log's side.
